author: newsr.in
title: Halo 5: Guardians Special Edition and Xbox One Bundle Get More Details, Unpacking
text: The development team at 343 Industries and publisher Microsoft are aiming to make the coming Halo 5: Guardians the biggest launch of the year and the two companies are trying to get fans interested in more than the most basic version of the game. A new video which features both Larry Hryb, aka Major Nelson, the main community liaison, and Josh Holmes, who leads the studio creating the Master Chief experience, talks about the special editions of the shooter and the bundle th...
